box2D.collision.Features

type
class
We use contact ids to facilitate warm starting.

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

_flip : Int

_incidentEdge : Int

_incidentVertex : Int

_m_id : B2ContactID

_referenceEdge : Int

flip(getFlip,setFlip) : Int

A value of 1 indicates that the reference edge is on shape2.

incidentEdge(getIncidentEdge,setIncidentEdge) : Int

The edge most anti-parallel to the reference edge.

incidentVertex(getIncidentVertex,setIncidentVertex) : Int

The vertex (0 or 1) on the incident edge that was clipped.

referenceEdge(getReferenceEdge,setReferenceEdge) : Int

The edge that defines the outward contact normal.
